name: Introduction to C Programming
description: This course provides an introduction to C Programming, covering the fundamentals of the language and its applications.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore the world of algorithms in this introductory course. Learn the basics of algorithm design and analysis and applications.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Get started with C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) in this comprehensive course and applications.

name: Basic Data Structures
description: Learn the fundamental data structures used in computer science and programming.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover the world of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) using Python in this introductory course.

name: Software Engineering
description: Gain insights into software engineering principles and best practices in this course.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Learn about Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing in this comprehensive course.

name: Database (MySQL)
description: Dive into the world of relational databases with a focus on MySQL in this course.

name: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this course, designed to sharpen your analytical thinking.
